propositions.text: 男人，男人，我们为什么要做男人？
“女人需要我们去征服世界，女人需要我们去保护她。”
“那如果女人不需要我们了呢？”

concepts.name: 男人
concepts.context: Repeatedly used to question the purpose and identity of men.

concepts.name: 女人
concepts.context: Presented as the primary reason for men's existence and purpose, requiring men to conquer and protect.

concepts.name: 征服世界
concepts.context: A task attributed to men by women.

concepts.name: 保护
concepts.context: A duty of men towards women.

concepts.name: 用
concepts.context: Related to the utility or purpose of men.

concepts.name: 什么
concepts.context: Used in interrogative phrases to explore identity and purpose.

hierarchy.structure: The document presents a circular argument, starting with a question about the purpose of men, answering it by referring to women's needs, and then posing further conditional questions that lead back to the initial existential questioning of men's identity and usefulness.
